frontmatter.title: String Searching
frontmatter.author: Benjamin Qi, Siyong Huang, Dustin Miao
frontmatter.description: Knuth-Morris-Pratt and Z Algorithms (and a few more related topics).

solution.sketch: Run KMP, except each state needs to be considered as not only a length, but also mapping of pattern to # of spots
